summary: Modern Talking was a popular German music duo made up of Dieter Bohlen and Thomas Anders. They were super successful, with many hit songs that charted high in different countries. Their biggest hits include "You're My Heart, You're My Soul" and "Cheri, Cheri Lady." The group was active from 1983 to 1987 and again from 1998 to 2003, selling over 120 million records worldwide.
title: Modern Talking
